elements.name: There should be at least 1 lower case char

steps.name: user clicks on New password field
user displays red color on the strength bar

elements.name: There should be at least 1 upper case char

steps.name: user clicks on New password field
user displays orange color on the strength bar

elements.name: There should be at least 1 digit char

steps.name: user clicks on New password field
user displays yellow color on the strength bar

elements.name: There should be at least 1 special case char

steps.name: user clicks on New password field
user displays green color on the strength bar

elements.name: There should be at least 7 chars for a stronger password

steps.name: user clicks on New password field
user provides at least 7 chars as lower case, upper case, digit and special char
user displays strength bar completely green
